headline: Delta’s President to Retire After 20 Years
summary: Glen Hauenstein will retire on Feb. 28, remaining as an advisor through 2026, after nearly 10 years as Delta’s president and more than two decades with the carrier.

raw.headline: Delta’s President to Retire After 20 Years
raw.summary: Glen Hauenstein will retire on Feb. 28, remaining as an advisor through 2026, after nearly 10 years as Delta’s president and more than two decades with the carrier.

headline: Delta president Glen Hauenstein, who helped turn airline into industry profit leader, to retire in February
summary: Delta's president, Glen Hauenstein, who helped turn Delta into the country's premium-travel leader, is retiring after 20 years.

raw.headline: Delta president Glen Hauenstein, who helped turn airline into industry profit leader, to retire in February

headline: Air Transport Services Group Appoints Greg Mays as President and Chief Executive Officer
summary: WILMINGTON, Ohio, December 17, 2025--ATSG today appointed Greg Mays as President and Chief Executive Officer, effective January 1, 2026. Mr. Mays succeeds Mike Berger, who is retiring.

raw.headline: Air Transport Services Group Appoints Greg Mays as President and Chief Executive Officer
raw.summary: WILMINGTON, Ohio, December 17, 2025--ATSG today appointed Greg Mays as President and Chief Executive Officer, effective January 1, 2026. Mr. Mays succeeds Mike Berger, who is retiring.

headline: Wheels Up to Launch Industry-First Self-Booking of Delta Commercial Flights for Members
summary: Wheels Up Experience Inc. (NYSE: UP), a leading provider of on-demand private aviation, today announced that beginning in early January 2026, Wheels Up members will be able to self-book Delta Air Lines commercial flights directly through Wheel Up's member web portal. For the first time in private aviation, members can access a fully integrated, self-service commercial airline booking experience within a private aviation membership platform. headline: UATP Appoints David Newington to Lead Asia-Pacific Commercial Team
summary: UATP, the global network enabling organizations to simplify payment processes and expand their payment capabilities, announced today the appointment of David Newington as Managing Director, Commercial, Asia-Pacific, effective immediately.

raw.headline: UATP Appoints David Newington to Lead Asia-Pacific Commercial Team
raw.summary: UATP, the global network enabling organizations to simplify payment processes and expand their payment capabilities, announced today the appointment of David Newington as Managing Director, Commercial, Asia-Pacific, effective immediately.

headline: 3 Travel Stocks to Ride the Global Tourism Boom in 2026
summary: From premium air travel and global hotel expansion to a powerful online booking platform, DAL, EXPE & HLT are well-positioned to ride the global tourism boom in 2026.

headline: How Companies Are Using AI to Squeeze More From Your Wallet
summary: Companies like Instacart and Delta and using AI to set prices. What you pay may hinge on how much the AI knows about you.

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Delta After Premium Cabin And Loyalty Investments?
summary: If you are wondering whether Delta Air Lines at around $71 a share is still a smart opportunity or if most of the upside is already priced in, this breakdown is designed to help you evaluate it with a cool head. The stock is up 5.5% over the last week, 21.8% over the past month, and 20.4% year to date, following a 122.3% gain over three years and 87.8% over five years, which indicates investors have been steadily re-rating the story. Recent headlines have highlighted Delta's continued...
